passages.text:
You find yourself in a castle throne roon. How do you wish to move?
[[kitchen]]
[[sleeping chamber]]
[[long hallway]]
passages.name: throne room

passages.text:
You appear to have entered a kitchen. What do you do?
[[go back to throne room->throne room]] 
[[search cabinets]]
[[go through next door]]
passages.name: kitchen

passages.text:
You appear to have entered the castle guards's sleeping chamber. What do you do?
[[go back to throne room->throne room]] 
[[sneak past guards to next room]]
[[awake a guard and ask "where am I"]]

passages.text:
You have entered a long hallway with passages running horizontal to you down both sides. 
[[return to the throne room->throne room]] 
[[go down right hallway]]
[[go down left hallway]]
